skills.purpose: Implement changes with a verification-first loop.

skills.name: wf-plan
outputs: Dossier `plan.md` with scope, sequencing, acceptance criteria, verification, rollout/rollback, and research references.
Commit decision (GO/NO-GO) at the end of `plan.md`.
skills.purpose: Create a commit-ready plan from a shaped packet (brief, breadboard, risks, spikes) before development starts.
skills.useWhen: This skill should only be used when the user uses the word workflow and asks to create a commit-ready, deep project plan from a shaped packet (brief, breadboard, risks, spikes) before development starts.

skills.name: wf-ralph
outputs: Updated PRD JSON story statuses (`status` + timestamps).
skills.purpose: Run the Ralph CLI loop (one story per iteration) for dev, review, research, and e2e.
skills.useWhen: This skill should only be used when the user uses the word workflow and asks to run the Ralph workflow loop (dev/review/research/e2e).

skills.name: wf-release
outputs: Docs artefacts saved per `docs/AGENTS.md` in the target repo (release notes, changelog entry, post-release notes as needed).
skills.purpose: Ship changes with a release checklist, changelog, and post-release verification.
skills.useWhen: This skill should only be used when the user uses the word workflow and asks to release or ship changes with a release checklist.

skills.name: wf-review
outputs: Todo files for all findings (file-todos skill).
skills.purpose: Single-agent exhaustive review: start with native `/review`, then multi-angle passes, mandatory file-todos, verification, GO/NO-GO.
skills.useWhen: This skill should only be used when the user uses the word workflow and asks to run a review workflow (multi-pass review, todos, verification).

skills.name: wf-shape
outputs: Optional `spike-investigation.md` with oracle notes for each spike.
skills.purpose: Shape messy inputs into a de-risked, de-scoped packet (brief, breadboard, risks, spikes) ready for wf-plan.
skills.useWhen: This skill should only be used when the user uses the word workflow and asks to shape a project from messy inputs into a de-risked, de-scoped shaped packet (brief, breadboard, risks, spikes) ready for wf-plan.
